ygData.subject: Re: what to kill
ygData.msgSnippet: ... First of all, if those are the lions and wolves in West Karanas, that might be a little too tough for you at that level.  In a group it might be possible,
ygData.messageBody:
> I wish I knew! I am lvl six and find myself getting killed
> a lot by lions
> and even wolves sometimes. If I don't time it right, if
> root doesn't take,
> or if I get a train I am dead. Please let me know what
> your thoughts are
> and/or how you made it throught 6 to 7.

First of all, if those are the lions and wolves in West Karanas, that
might be a little too tough for you at that level. In a group it
might be possible, but alone I would leave the adult lions alone.
Secondly, a good way to get white and yellow mobs without too much
risk is to play near a guard tower or zone border. That way you can
run for safety if things get too hairy (or if Root fails).

Aznyin
Level 13 Erudite Wizard
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
